title: Hedge Funds Turn More Bullish on Brent Oil as Iran Risks Swirl
description: Hedge funds turned the most bullish on Brent oil since April as unrest in Iran, OPEC’s fourth-biggest producer, revived risk premium in crude prices.
content: Hedge funds turned the most bullish on Brent oil since April as unrest in Iran, OPEC’s fourth-biggest producer, revived risk premium in crude prices.
